small.title: Walmart’s C.E.O. Joins Group to Rebuke Trump Over Charlottesville
small.abstract: Doug McMillon, Walmart’s chief executive, said the president “missed a critical opportunity to help bring our country together.”

small.title: Trump Shares, Then Deletes, Twitter Post of Train Hitting Cartoon Person Covered by CNN Logo
small.abstract: Days after a driver rammed into a crowd in Charlottesville, Va., the president retweets a cartoon attacking the news network.

small.title: Black Democrats Rally Behind New York Senator Amid Racial Politicking
small.abstract: Support for Andrea Stewart-Cousins, the New York Senate minority leader, comes as another racially charged remark from a charter school proponent has emerged.
